David's <FI>Psalm<Fi> of praise. I will extol thee, my God, O king; and I will bless thy name for ever and ever.
Every day will I bless thee; and I will praise thy name for ever and ever.
Great <FI>is<Fi> the LORD, and greatly to be praised; and his greatness <FI>is<Fi> unsearchable.<RF>and his…: Heb. and of his greatness there is no search<Rf>
One generation shall praise thy works to another, and shall declare thy mighty acts.
I will speak of the glorious honour of thy majesty, and of thy wondrous works.<RF>works: Heb. things, or, words<Rf>
And <FI>men<Fi> shall speak of the might of thy terrible acts: and I will declare thy greatness.<RF>declare: Heb. declare it<Rf>
They shall abundantly utter the memory of thy great goodness, and shall sing of thy righteousness.
The LORD <FI>is<Fi> gracious, and full of compassion; slow to anger, and of great mercy.<RF>of great…: Heb. great in mercy<Rf>
The LORD <FI>is<Fi> good to all: and his tender mercies <FI>are<Fi> over all his works.<CM>
All thy works shall praise thee, O LORD; and thy saints shall bless thee.
They shall speak of the glory of thy kingdom, and talk of thy power;
To make known to the sons of men his mighty acts, and the glorious majesty of his kingdom.
Thy kingdom <FI>is<Fi> an everlasting kingdom, and thy dominion <FI>endureth<Fi> throughout all generations.<RF>an…: Heb. a kingdom of all ages<Rf>
The LORD upholdeth all that fall, and raiseth up all <FI>those that be<Fi> bowed down.
The eyes of all wait upon thee; and thou givest them their meat in due season.<RF>wait…: or, look unto<Rf>
Thou openest thine hand, and satisfiest the desire of every living thing.
The LORD <FI>is<Fi> righteous in all his ways, and holy in all his works.<RF>holy: or, merciful, or, bountiful<Rf>
The LORD <FI>is<Fi> nigh unto all them that call upon him, to all that call upon him in truth.
He will fulfil the desire of them that fear him: he also will hear their cry, and will save them.
The LORD preserveth all them that love him: but all the wicked will he destroy.
My mouth shall speak the praise of the LORD: and let all flesh bless his holy name for ever and ever.<CM>
